item.title: Makeing custom items
item.dc:creator: @satansangel satansangel
item.description:
@satansangel wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:8, topic:226611”]First, if you want to have items in your client, I suggest being smart enough to at least post in right section.
Once your done that, you must get the models needed, and then in Class8.java do the ints etc.

Pick a ID that isn’t used, or some item that you think is useless.
Now, once your done that, Item.cfg and add it to the list so it’ll give bonuses etc and store value.

Now, in Item.java you must select the place where the item will fit, if its a glove, don’t put it in the cape section.[/quote]

wurd.

Read full topic

item.title: Makeing custom items
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

First, if you want to have items in your client, I suggest being smart enough to at least post in right section.
Once your done that, you must get the models needed, and then in Class8.java do the ints etc.

Pick a ID that isn’t used, or some item that you think is useless.
Now, once your done that, Item.cfg and add it to the list so it’ll give bonuses etc and store value.

Now, in Item.java you must select the place where the item will fit, if its a glove, don’t put it in the cape section.

Read full topic
